title: Modern 2Bed in Lakeview
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 299614659', 'Rent: $1,995 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: no parking', 'Stunning 2-bed/1-bath located in the heart of Northalsted!', 'Unit has hardwood flooring throughout, central air, stainless steel appliances, a sunroom and much more!', 'Just steps from Halsted bus stops, and a short walk to both Addison and Belmont red line stations!', 'Rent includes water and refuse/recycling and tenant is responsible for electricity and gas - pet-friendly building with a $20/month pet rent!', 'FEATURES', 'Central Air', 'Dishwasher', 'Eat-In Kitchen', 'Gas Range', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Laundry in Building', 'Newly Remodeled', 'Pets OK', 'Remodeled Bathroom', 'Remodeled Kitchen', 'Stainless appliances', 'Water included', 'OTHER INFORMATION:', 'Note: Photos may display another unit.', 'Please contact us with any comments/questions or to schedule a showing today!!', '** Fair Housing – Equal Opportunities **', 'Contact Hours:', 'Monday – Friday', '9am – 5pm', 'Cagan Management, Inc.', '** Please note: the move-in date is stated, we do', 'NOT', 'allow earlier move-ins.', 'Thank you for understanding, CM.']
